devdoc.details: This contract manages asset price feeds used by the diamond contract.

params.unit: The address of the unit (e.g., USD).

returns._1: investRoundId The round ID of the asset's price feed.
returns._2: stableRoundId The round ID of the unit's price feed.
returns.price: The current price of the asset in terms of the unit.

params.roundId: the round for which price is required.

returns._0: price The price of the asset based on round Id

params.investRoundId: The round ID of the asset's price feed.
params.stableRoundId: The round ID of the unit's price feed.
params.unit: The address of the unit (e.g., USD).

returns._0: price The price of the asset in terms of the unit at the specified round IDs.
price The price of the asset in USD

params._feed: The address of the price feed for the asset.

devdoc.title: PriceOracleFacet

getPrice(address,address).notice: Get the current price and round IDs of an asset relative to a unit.

getPriceBasedOnRoundId(address,uint80).notice: Get the price of an asset in USD.

getRoundData(uint80,uint80,address,addre.notice: Get the historical price of an asset relative to a unit at specific round IDs.

getUSDPrice(address).notice: Get the price of an asset in USD.

setAssetFeed(address,address).notice: Sets the asset price feed address for a specific asset.
